Detailed Description

StationaryCF.h

Created on: 27 Oct 2009 Author: barillrl Stationary covariance function. This is the base class for stationary covariance functions of the form: sigma * k(sqdit), where sigma is a scaling factor (process variance) and k is a correlation function which only depends on the squared distance between two inputs (sqdist).
